name: Sell Surplus
brief: Trade resources for gold based on commerce structure tier
description: Convert excess resources into gold through your kingdom's commerce infrastructure. Better commerce structures provide better trade rates. Requires at least one commerce structure.

criticalSuccess.description: Use trade rate one tier higher than your commerce structure. Imperial Bank achieves legendary 1:3 rate!

success.description: Use your current commerce structure's trade rate

special: Trade a single resource type for gold. Amounts must be divisible by your trade ratio (e.g., with 3:2 rate, trade in sets of 3). Commerce tier determines rate: T1 Market Square (2:1) → T2 Bazaar (3:2) → T3 Merchant Guild (1:1) → T4 Imperial Bank (1:2) → Bonus Tier (1:3, critical success only)
